thread.title: Voices: Joshua Coleman, on Using a ‘Quarterback’ to Serve High-Net-Worth Clients
thread.title_full: Voices: Joshua Coleman, on Using a ‘Quarterback’ to Serve High-Net-Worth Clients - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Voices: Joshua Coleman, on Using a ‘Quarterback’ to Serve High-Net-Worth Clients
text:
Voices is an occasional feature in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. Joshua Coleman is chief executive and founder of Momentum Advanced Planning in Chicago.
When our firm talks about the needs specific to high-net-worth clients, we refer to it as advanced planning. These are the services beyond the core building blocks of financial planning and asset management that any retail client would expect or require of an adviser. A family that needs to insure $500 million in real...
